      • performRequest

        public static io.restassured.response.Response performRequest(java.lang.String requestType,
                                                              java.lang.String targetStatusCode,
                                                              java.lang.String serviceURI,
                                                              java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                              java.lang.String argument)
        Attempts to perform POST/GET request to a REST API, then checks the response status code, if it matches the target code the step is passed and the response is returned. Otherwise the action fails and NULL is returned.
        Parameters:
        requestType; - POST/GET
        targetStatusCode; - 200
        serviceURI; - http://serviceURL.com:PORT/serviceROOT
        serviceName; - /servicePATH/serviceNAME
        argument; - arguments without a preceding ?
        Returns:
        Response; returns the full response object for further manipulation
